Message:
In Galia, witches, immigrants,
and criminals were all treated
equally as second-class citizens.

We were all pushed
into the cramped,
dirty Internment Zone.
Every day was dog eat dog...
so the war was a godsend.

After all,
if I joined the military,
I’d be able to eat food
and not feel cold.

Still, all second-rate citizens
are treated as pawns,

forced into the frontlines
with little to no training.

The lot of bottom-feeders
were massacred—
their bodies dropping
left and right.

I assembled all
the witches together.
We protected each other as
we coordinated our powers,

Then...when the battle
was over, we were
the only ones left
with our limbs intact.

That was when the
Witch Corps was born.
